attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the government to prove that Gordon Brown is more caring than Tony Blair by cutting their losses and reduce the deaths of our loved ones in Iraq by scrapping the flawed SA-80 rifle and its modified version the SA-80-A2 and replace it with effective assault rifles such as the Heckler Koch G-36 or Beretta CX4 Storm Assault rifle which DOESNT jam like the SA-80
